title: Make Me Believe
description: Book 3 in the Twelve Quickies of Christmas series.Chelly is going nuts â€” she thinks. And she's fighting for the right to keep her little boy. Right before Christmas, her ex announces he is going to sue for custody of their child. Because she is losing her mind. She is talking to a man who doesn't exist. A tall, sexy creature with wicked blue eyes and magic in his hands. And he can't possibly exist. After all, elves aren't real.
author: Shiloh Walker
